description: The central government imposes restrictions in the capital region as Covid-19 cases continue to rise.
title: Madrid coronavirus: Spain orders lockdown amid rise in cases
title_page: Madrid coronavirus: Spain orders lockdown amid rise in cases - BBC News
maintext: Regional health chief Enrique Ruiz Escudero accused the central government of sending a "message of alarm and agitation" and did not rule out fighting the lockdown in court. But Madrid president Isabel D¨ªaz Ayuso said on Thursday that while the order would be challenged in court, it would be complied with.
